ISSUE.TITLE: labeling interface parsing fails on `Choices` of single length
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** Parsing labeling interface config with `Choices` containing only one `Choice` will fail with the following error: ``` Validation failed on Choice: OrderedDict([('value', 'choice1')]) is not of type 'array' ``` **To Reproduce** Check [this playground](https://labelstud.io/playground/?config=%3CView%3E%20%20%3Cbr%3E%20%20%3CChoices%20name%3D%22choice%22%20toName%3D%22text%22%20choice%3D%22multiple%22%3E%3Cbr%3E%20%20%20%20%3CChoice%20value%3D%22choice1%22%20%2F%3E%3Cbr%3E%20%20%20%20%3C!--%20%3CChoice%20value%3D%22choice2%22%20%2F%3E%20--%3E%3Cbr%3E%20%20%3C%2FChoices%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%20%20%3CText%20name%3D%22text%22%20value%3D%22%24text%22%2F%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C%2FView%3E%3Cbr%3E). **Expected behavior** Works well just like other length. If length of at least two is required for single choice, report this more clearly and allow single length for multiple choice at least. **Screenshots** ![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38486514/128654881-4f51c1eb-d238-471f-9182-a42a5ca14fd0.png) ![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38486514/128654898-c33347c6-ba99-4ac0-83b0-8cc4e46946e8.png)
